## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 38,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | To ensure sufficient inventory to cover forecasted demand with a 5% buffer for demand variability and avoid potential stockouts. This order size is also chosen to leverage the available vendor order quantity options efficiently. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 8,000 units higher than the player's planned order size. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 4.7 days                                  |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days                                      |
| Comments                          |  While the player planned to order 30,000 units, this might not be sufficient to cover the forecasted demand.  Ordering 38,000 units (3x12,000 + 2x1,000) provides a larger safety stock and better aligns with the available vendor order quantities.  |
